## scoreStringSimilarity() function

Calculates a similarity between the an input and a reference string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function scoreStringSimilarity(inputData: string, referenceData: string, opts?: SimilarityOpts): SimilarityResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inputData | string | Input data to compare against the reference |
|  referenceData | string | Reference string to compare the input against |
|  opts | [SimilarityOpts](./finder-string-similarity-score.similarityopts.md) | Additional options for calculating a score |

<b>Returns:</b>

SimilarityResult
